task.summary: Default task
pv_production.py is working fine. Need to check the PV module and inverter prices and see if they could be replaced by something more recent
Need to fix the index / I got some empty rows for the weeks I am not considering. I have already tried "dropna", unfortunately not working.
Now working with LV profiles for "winter week". Still need to: 1. Create the "summer week", by shaving the peaks due heating 2. Merge the data from MV profiles

MV and LV demand for Q1 and Q4 is there, now need to fix Q2 and Q3; MV demand - get the data from dataset, LV demand do the peak shaving
PV production timeframe now set properly
Optimization with winter week only is working fine. Need to check the MV profiles - I may have to drop one
Now working! Still need to fix the levelised costs per kW and the summer consumption for LV profiles

Working with EWH consumption profiles - optmization_flex.py not working Check the community_demand.py: 1. need to fix the ewh_on including more consecutive periods 2. think about optimization constrains etc ...
optimization_flex.py need to be fixed! There is an error recording the consumption shifts or while changing the flexible assets available
Need to work on optimazion_flex.py still need to fix the logic!
Working on prova! Still need to find new logic to test
Need to work on the new_ewh_availability: 1. Try to make classic for loop 2. ??
Need to fix the way new_ewh_status is changing Understand how df['sun surplus'] is changing in the cycle
prova_1 seems working better, now have to see how much this optimization low down costs and increase optimal number of PV
Find out what prova_1 is doing beacuse the results it pops out are quite strange ewh_profiles gauss working fine!
need to understand why the while cycle doesn't finish during DAY 5
To fix: 1. Understand why negative values 2. Check if ewh_status and new_ewh_status per day are the same

Now working!
Need to upgrade with the "move only if the next use is after the shift" - Focus on ewh_n_status_day DF; maybe avoid to create ewh_..._day DFs
Trying to implement with one constraint

optimization_flex - goes through the profiles instead of time step per time step
prova - is now doing the sensitivity analysis but still got problems; cost2 is < than cost3
prova_1 - old code that allows shifting status even to previous time steps
prova_2 - old code that allows shifting status only postponing
General Update!

expression.expression-string: print('Time step %d v ***************' % time_step) print('new status %d' % new_ewh_status_day[time_step]) print('sum old %d' % np.sum(ewh_status_day[:time_step + 1])) print('sum new %d' % np.sum(new_ewh_status_day[:time_step + 1])) print('available %d' % available) print('period %s' % period_price_day[time_step])
